plot: A good natured Welshman reviews films and TV shows for which he has a soft spot, concentrating more on their good traits than bad.
plot_en: A good natured Welshman reviews films and TV shows for which he has a soft spot, concentrating more on their good traits than bad.
plot_es: A good natured Welshman reviews films and TV shows for which he has a soft spot, concentrating more on their good traits than bad.
title: Welshy Reviews
